mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, NAME as name, OWNER as owner, SPECIES as species, SEX as sex, BIRTH as birth, DEATH as death FROM Pet where name = #{name}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Pet (NAME, OWNER, SPECIES, SEX, BIRTH, DEATH) VALUES (#{name}, #{owner}, #{species}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{death})
